[[Image:AndrewButler.jpg|thumb|Andrew Butler]]
'''Andrew Butler''' is a former editor of the [[Amon Hen (journal)|journal ''Amon Hen'']]. Butler has been a member of [[The Tolkien Society]] since [[1980]], and he edited ''Amon Hen'' from [[Amon Hen 161|issue 161]] in January [[2000]] to [[Amon Hen 282|issue 282]] in March [[2020]].

He also set up ''The Baldric Press'' to publish a collection of fantasy short stories by Alex Hall, illustrated by Mike Johnson, inspired by the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]], but not featuring his characters or settings.
